steps.title: Sketch the V-shape body of the electric guitar.
steps.content: Sketch the V-shape body of the electric guitar.

steps.title: Sketch the shapes for neck and head area.
steps.content: Sketch the shapes for neck and head area.

steps.title: Sketch the additional details and parts of the guitar.
steps.content: Sketch the additional details and parts of the guitar.

steps.title: Sketch the decals and decorations if needed.
steps.content: Sketch the decals and decorations if needed.

steps.title: Refine the artwork using a smaller tipped drawing tool.
steps.content: Refine the artwork using a smaller tipped drawing tool.

steps.title: Draw the outline over the sketch.
steps.content: Draw the outline over the sketch.

steps.title: Remove the sketch marks and add color.
steps.content: Remove the sketch marks and add color.

steps.title: Sketch the wireframe of a person playing a guitar.
steps.content: Sketch the wireframe of a person playing a guitar.

steps.title: Sketch the basic shapes of the body and the guitar.
steps.content: Sketch the basic shapes of the body and the guitar.

steps.title: Sketch additional details for the face, clothes and the guitar.
steps.content: Sketch additional details for the face, clothes and the guitar.

steps.title: Refine the Sketch using a smaller tipped drawing tool.
steps.content: Refine the Sketch using a smaller tipped drawing tool.

steps.title: Draw the outlines over the sketch.
steps.content: Draw the outlines over the sketch.

steps.title: Erase and remove the sketch marks.
steps.content: Erase and remove the sketch marks.

steps.title: Add color.
steps.content: Add color.

steps.title: Sketch a pear like shape in the middle of the page.
steps.content: Sketch a pear like shape in the middle of the page. This will be the body of the guitar.

steps.title: Draw a long slim oval on top of the body.
steps.content: Draw a long slim oval on top of the body.

steps.title: At the upper end of the long oval draw a small oval, and a small circle at the lower end.
steps.content: At the upper end of the long oval draw a small oval, and a small circle at the lower end.

steps.title: Outline the shape of the guitar.
steps.content: Outline the shape of the guitar. Add in details like the strings.

steps.title: Carefully erase the sketch lines and make the contour stronger.
steps.content: Carefully erase the sketch lines and make the contour stronger.

steps.title: Add in the color!
steps.content: Add in the color! Follow the illustration for reference or color as you please.

steps.title: Sketch a pear like shape in the middle of the page.
steps.content: Sketch a pear like shape in the middle of the page. This will be the body of the guitar.

steps.title: On top of the body draw a long slim oval.
steps.content: On top of the body draw a long slim oval.

steps.title: At the upper end of the long oval draw another pear like shape, but smaller.
steps.content: At the upper end of the long oval draw another pear like shape, but smaller.

steps.title: Outline the shape of the guitar.
steps.content: Outline the shape of the guitar. Add in details like the strings and buttons.

steps.title: Carefully erase the sketch lines and make the contour stronger.
steps.content: Carefully erase the sketch lines and make the contour stronger.

steps.title: Add in the color!
steps.content: Add in the color! Follow the illustration for reference or make it as cool as you like.
